about_the_game:
With the Night Club for RPG Maker and more, you’ll get neon lighting, music equipment, a fully stocked bar, animated disco ball and more! It’s party time!

The Night Club Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Dark concrete (two shades) and plain floor tiles
Brick floor
Grate floor
Shiny neon floors (4 styles)
Neon floor stripes (2 styles)
Neon-edged tables (2 styles)
and more!

Walls:

Stocked bar autotile wall, speaker autotile wall, plus several styles of neon walls to match flooring. Also includes plain walls of several styles.

Also featuring:

Neon-edged seating (sofa-style, barstool and more)
Scaffolding for lights and speakers
Stage
Stairs
Cordons
Doors and windows
Curtains
Fully-stocked bar (with matching beer taps)
Large screens – add animations to suit your club’s vibe
DJ and music equipment, with turntables, speakers, etc
Crystal wall decorations
Hanging LED decor
Lettering and signage
plus more!

Events and Animations (RPG Maker format, may work with your engine)

Disco ball
Doors (lit, unlit and transparent backgrounds, red and blue variations)
Various small glowing lights
Moving spotlight (several colors)

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
